channel.title: Tools on DIYDeveloper.io
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on DIYDeveloper.io

item.title: How to find spare parts at the wreckers
item.description: Wrecking yards (or junk yards if you are American) are a great place to get spare parts for your car at massive discounts. There are a few things you need to know before going.

item.title: Different Types of power drills explained
item.description: Buying a drill is easy right? Yeah, nah. Do you need to smash through concrete? Drive screws in? hang a picture? Choose the wrong drill for the task, and it is going to take a long time. I’m going to explain the different types of drills and their uses.
